about_the_game:
Not happy with the cards you have been dealt? What if you could change that?

In Klondike's Hike, you battle enemies by completing solitaire puzzles, and you can beat the random odds by modifying your cards and changing the rules of the game to progress further and further against the many hazards thrown at you.

Modify your deck until it is unrecognizable and try to defeat all the bosses to reach the Shores of Gold!

Modify your cards

With the modifiers, you can remove a card's suit, or rank, or even give it attributes it shouldn't have. Place your cards wherever you want!

Modify the board

You can use items to grab cards from behind piles, reorder whole columns, or even re-deal the entire tableau.

Modify the rules

Who's to say you can only build down? Use the trading cards to change the very base rules of the game!

Your opponents are cheating anyway, so why shouldn't you?

short_description: Klondike, a gold-panning otter, had a vision of golden shores up in the mountains. Help her reach this mythical place in this solitaire-based roguelike! Use items to modify your cards, bend the rules, and power through the many traps in your way.
